title: Every Game on Ethereum Scaler Immutable in the Epic Games Store
description: Many games are using Ethereum layer-2 blockchain Immutable X or the upcoming  Immutable zkEVM. Here's what you'll find on the Epic Games Store.

title: Ripple’s Game-Changer Alert: XRP’s Utility to Soar with Single-Sided Staking
description: XRP is gaining enhanced utility through Futureverse’s new staking feature. XRP has bullish projections from many analysts one of whom says the coin can touch $10,000. XRP, the cryptocurrency associated with Ripple Labs Inc., is set to undergo a game-changing transformation with the introduction of single-sided staking. The revelation comes from Crypto Eri, a prominent [...]
